reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Strengthening of the handicraft value chains and the design in Tunisia

description.narrative: Obiettivo del programma è sostenere artigianato e catene del valore in Tunisia, promuovere il settore imprenditoriale locale e sviluppare sinergie tra agricoltura, turismo, artigianato e patrimonio culturale. A tal fine, il programma prevede una serie di attività. con l'obiettivo specifico di rafforzare le capacità del Ministero del turismo tunisino al fine di potenziare il settore artigianale e aumentare il suo contributo al PIL

The aim of the program is to support handicfrafts and design value chains in Tunisia, promoting the local business sector and developping, synergies between the agriculture, tourism, handicraft, and cultural heritage.To this end, a series of activities are envisaged by this program with the specific objective of strengthening the capacities of the Tunisian Ministry of Tourism in order to empower handicraft sector and to increase his contribution in the GDP.

UNIDO - ORGANIZZAZIONE DELLE NAZIONI UNITE PER LO SVILUPPO INDUSTRIALE

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services
Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
